gay.translation[0].definitions[0].defini: if someone, especially a man, is gay, they are sexually attracted to people of the same sex
gay.translation[0].definitions[0].exampl: a campaigner for gay rights  (=equal treatment for gay people)
gay.translation[0].definitions[2].exampl: She felt excited and quite gay.
gay.translation[0].definitions[3].defini: stupid or not good. Some people think that this word is offensive.
gay.translation[0].definitions[3].exampl: That was a gay thing to do!
gay.translation[1].definitions[0].defini: someone who is homosexual, especially a man
